definition: Tibetan prayer flag
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing
banner

sentences.english: Prayer flags was read by thousands of times.
sentences.chinese: 经幡上的经文，颂念千遍万遍。

sentences.english: Sutra streamer in the wind make the bridge to the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 两道晨风中的经幡搭起通向天空的桥。

sentences.english: The pass itself is dotted with prayer flags and there are several herds of yak around.
sentences.chinese: 这个关口到处都经幡，附近还有几个牦牛群。

sentences.english: Gorgeous Yu Long Xue Shan sets the background for the sea of relgious flags.
sentences.chinese: 壮丽的玉龙雪山，为五彩经幡旗当背景。

sentences.english: There's a lot of couleur locale here still.
The colorful streamers , how many dreams have bore down upon it?
sentences.chinese: 五色经幡，究竟承载了多少梦想？
